Verses: 1 savul Raajyapaarampanni, Oru Varushamaayitru; Avan Isravelai Irantaam Varusham Arasaantapodhu,

2 isravelil Moovaayiramperaith Thanakkuth Therindhukontaan; Avarkalil Irantaayiramper Savulotekoota Mikmaasilum Peththel Malaiyilum, Aayiramper Yonaththaanotekootap Penyameen Naattilulla Kipiyaavilum Irundhaarkal; Matra Janangalai Avaravar Kootaarangalukku Anuppivittaan.

3 yonaththaan Kepaavile Thaanaiyam Irundha Pelisdharai Muriya Atiththaan; Pelisdhar Adhaik Kelvippattaarkal; Aakaiyinaal Idhai Epireyar Ketkakkatavarkal Endru Savul Thesamengum Ekkaalam Oodhuviththaan.

4 thaanaiyam Irundha Pelisdharaich Chavul Muriya Atiththaan Endrum, Isravelar Pelisdharukku Aruvaruppaanaarkal Endrum, Isravelellaam Kelvippattapodhu, Janangal Savulukkup Pinsellumpati Kilkaalukku Varavazhaikkappattaarkal.

5 pelisdhar Isravelotu Yuththam Pannumpati Muppadhinaayiram Iradhangalotum, Aaraayiram Kudhiraiveerarotum, Katarkarai Manalaththanai Janangalotum Kootikkontuvandhu, Peththaavelukkuk Kizhakkaana Mikmaasile Paalayamiranginaarkal.

6 appozhudhu Isravelar Thangalukku Untaana Ikkattaik Kantapodhu, Janangal Thangalukku Untaana Nerukkaththinaale Kepikalilum, Mutkaatukalilum, Kanmalaikalilum, Thurukkangalilum, Kukaikalilum Oliththukkontaarkal
7 epireyaril Silar Yordhaanaiyum Katandhu, Kaadh Naattirkum Keeleyaaththesaththirkum Ponaarkal; Savulo Innum Kilkaalil Irundhaan; Sakala Janangalum Payandhukontu Avanukkup Pinsendraarkal.
8 avan Thanakkuch Chaamuvel Kuriththa Kaalaththinpati Ezhunaalmattum Kaaththirundhaan; Saamuvel Kilkaalukku Varavillai, Janangal Avanai Vittuch Chidharip Ponaarkal.
9 appozhudhu Savul: Sarvaanga Thakanapaliyaiyum Samaadhaanapalikalaiyum Ennitaththil Kontuvaarungal Endru Solli, Sarvaangadhakanapaliyaich Cheluththinaan.
10 avan Sarvaanga Thakanapaliyittu Mutikirapodhu, Idho, Saamuvel Vandhaan; Savul Avanaich Chandhiththu Vandhananjeyya Avanukku Edhirkontuponaan.

11 neer Seydhadhu Enna Endru Saamuvel Kettadharku Savul: Janangal Ennaivittuch Chidharippokiradhaiyum, Kuriththa Naatkalin Thittaththile Neervaraadhadhaiyum, Pelisdhar Mikmaasile Kootivandhirukkiradhaiyum, Naan Kantapatiyinaale,

12 kilkaalil Pelisdhar Enakku Virodhamaai Vandhuvituvaarkal Endrum, Naan Innum Karththarutaiya Samukaththai Nokki Vinnappampannavillai Endrum, Ennith Thunindhu, Sarvaanga Thakanapaliyaich Cheluththinen Endraan.

13 saamuvel Savulaip Paarththu: Puththiyeenamaaich Cheydheer; Ummutaiya Thevanaakiya Karththar Umakku Vidhiththa Kattalaiyaik Kaikkollaamarponeer; Matrappatikarththar Isravelin Mel Ummutaiya Raajyapaaraththai Endraikkum Sdhirappatuththuvaar.

14 ippodho Ummutaiya Raajyapaaram Nilainirkaadhu; Karththar Thammutaiya Irudhayaththirku Etra Oru Manushanaith Thamakkuth Theti, Avanaik Karththar Thammutaiya Janangalmel Thalaivanaayirukkak Kattalaiyittaar; Karththar Umakku Vidhiththa Kattalaiyai Neer Kaikkollavillaiye Endru Sonnaan.
15 saamuvel Ezhundhirundhu, Kilkaalai Vittu, Penyameen Naattilulla Kipiyaavukkup Ponaan; Savul Thannotekoota Irukkira Janaththaith Thokaipaarkkirapodhu, Erakkuraiya Arunooruper Irundhaarkal.
16 savulum Avan Kumaaranaakiya Yonaththaanum Avarkalotekoota Irukkira Janangalum Penyameen Naattilulla Kipiyaavil Irundhuvittaarkal; Pelisdharo Mikmaasile Paalayamirangiyirundhaarkal.
17 kollaikkaarar Pelisdharin Paalayaththilirundhu Moondru Pataiyaaip Purappattuvandhaarkal; Oru Patai Opraavazhiyaaich Choovaal Naattirku Neraakap Poyitru.
18 veroru Patai Peththoron Vazhiyaaip Poyitru; Veroru Pataivanaandharaththil Irukkira Sepoyeemin Pallaththaakkukku Edhiraana Ellaivazhiyaaip Poyitru.
19 epireyar Pattayangalaiyaakilum Eettikalaiyaakilum Untupannaadhapatikkup Paarththukkollaventum Endru Pelisdhar Solliyirundhapatiyaal, Isravel Thesaththil Engum Oru Kollan Akappatavillai.

20 isravelar Yaavarum Avaravar Thangal Kozhuvirumpukalaiyum, Thangal Manvettikalaiyum, Thangal Kotarikalaiyum, Thangal Katappaaraikalaiyum Theettik Koormaiyaakkukiradharku, Pelisdharitaththukkup Pokaventiyadhaayirundhadhu.
21 katappaaraikalaiyum, Manvettikalaiyum, Mukkoorulla Aayudhangalaiyum, Kotarikalaiyum, Thaatrukkolkalaiyum Koormaiyaakkukiradharku Arangal Maaththiram Avarkalitaththil Irundhadhu.
22 yuththanaal Vandhapodhu, Savulukkum Avan Kumaaranaakiya Yonaththaanukkumeyandri, Savulotum Yonaththaanotum Irukkira Janangalil Oruvar Kaiyilum Pattayamum Eettiyum Illaadhirundhadhu.
23 pelisdharin Paalayam Mikmaasilirundhu Pokira Vazhimattum Parampiyirundhadhu.
